TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit NodeLabelEditEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

summary.span: 提供有关 和 事件的数据。

span.span: Provides data for the and events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件发生在用户完成编辑树节点的文本。The event occurs when the user finishes editing the text for a tree node. 事件发生时在用户开始编辑树节点的文本。The event occurs when the user begins editing the text for a tree node. 一个对象指定要与树节点，包含要编辑的标签的树节点关联的新文本和是否已取消编辑操作。A object specifies the new text to associate with the tree node, the tree node that contains the label to edit, and whether the edit operation has been canceled. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 以下示例允许用户编辑通过使用非根树节点。The following example allows the user to edit nonroot tree nodes by using a . 当用户右键单击鼠标处的位置确定和存储在变量名为`mySelectedNode`。When the user right clicks the mouse, the at that position is determined and stored in a variable named `mySelectedNode`. 如果选择了非根树节点，则它会处于可编辑状态，这样就允许用户编辑节点标签。If a nonroot tree node was selected, it is put into an editable state, allowing the user to edit the node label. 用户停止编辑树节点标签后，新的标签文本计算，并保存。After the user stops editing the tree node label, the new label text is evaluated and saved. 对于此示例中，有几个字符被视为不在标签文本中有效。For this example, several characters are considered not valid in the label text. 如果一个无效字符中的标签字符串，或者该字符串为空，用户将收到错误通知和标签返回到其以前的文本。If one of the invalid characters is in the label string, or the string is empty, the user is notified of the error and the label is returned to its previous text. [!code-cpp[classic treenode.beginedit example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic TreeNode.BeginEdit Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[classic treenode.beginedit example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic TreeNode.BeginEdit Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[classic treenode.beginedit example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic TreeNode.BeginEdit Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 以下示例允许用户编辑通过使用非根树节点。The following example allows the user to edit nonroot tree nodes by using a . 当用户右键单击鼠标处的位置确定和存储在变量名为`mySelectedNode`。When the user right clicks the mouse, the at that position is determined and stored in a variable named `mySelectedNode`. 如果选择了非根树节点，则它会处于可编辑状态，这样就允许用户编辑节点标签。If a nonroot tree node was selected, it is put into an editable state, allowing the user to edit the node label. 用户停止编辑树节点标签后，新的标签文本计算，并保存。After the user stops editing the tree node label, the new label text is evaluated and saved. 对于此示例中，有几个字符被视为不在标签文本中有效。For this example, several characters are considered not valid in the label text. 如果一个无效字符中的标签字符串，或者该字符串为空，用户将收到错误通知和标签返回到其以前的文本。If one of the invalid characters is in the label string, or the string is empty, the user is notified of the error and the label is returned to its previous text. [!code-cpp[classic treenode.beginedit example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic TreeNode.BeginEdit Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[classic treenode.beginedit example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic TreeNode.BeginEdit Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[classic treenode.beginedit example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic TreeNode.BeginEdit Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取与树节点关联的新文本。

span.span: Gets the new text to associate with the tree node.

value.span: 表示新 标签的字符串值或 （如果用户取消编辑）。

span.span: The string value that represents the new label or if the user cancels the edit.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的值是`null`如果用户按下 esc 键来取消编辑，或按下 ENTER 键而无需修改的标签文本。The value of this property is `null` if the user presses ESC to cancel the edit or presses ENTER without modifying the label text. 如果用户编辑的标签文本，则此属性的值是新的标签文本。If the user edits the label text, the value of this property is the new label text. 即使已编辑的标签文本的最终值等同于其原始值，这是如此。This is true even if the final value of edited label text is the same as its original value. ## Examples 以下示例允许用户编辑通过使用非根树节点。The following example allows the user to edit nonroot tree nodes by using a . 当用户右键单击鼠标处的位置确定和存储在变量名为`mySelectedNode`。When the user right clicks the mouse, the at that position is determined and stored in a variable named `mySelectedNode`. 如果选择了非根树节点，则它会处于可编辑状态，这样就允许用户编辑节点标签。If a nonroot tree node was selected, it is put into an editable state, allowing the user to edit the node label. 用户停止编辑树节点标签后，新的标签文本计算，并保存。After the user stops editing the tree node label, the new label text is evaluated and saved. 对于此示例中，有几个字符被视为不在标签文本中有效。For this example, several characters are considered not valid in the label text. 如果一个无效字符中的标签字符串，或者该字符串为空，用户将收到错误通知和标签返回到其以前的文本。If one of the invalid characters is in the label string, or the string is empty, the user is notified of the error and the label is returned to its previous text. [!code-cpp[classic treenode.beginedit example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic TreeNode.BeginEdit Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[classic treenode.beginedit example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic TreeNode.BeginEdit Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[classic treenode.beginedit example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic TreeNode.BeginEdit Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 以下示例允许用户编辑通过使用非根树节点。The following example allows the user to edit nonroot tree nodes by using a . 当用户右键单击鼠标处的位置确定和存储在变量名为`mySelectedNode`。When the user right clicks the mouse, the at that position is determined and stored in a variable named `mySelectedNode`. 如果选择了非根树节点，则它会处于可编辑状态，这样就允许用户编辑节点标签。If a nonroot tree node was selected, it is put into an editable state, allowing the user to edit the node label. 用户停止编辑树节点标签后，新的标签文本计算，并保存。After the user stops editing the tree node label, the new label text is evaluated and saved. 对于此示例中，有几个字符被视为不在标签文本中有效。For this example, several characters are considered not valid in the label text. 如果一个无效字符中的标签字符串，或者该字符串为空，用户将收到错误通知和标签返回到其以前的文本。If one of the invalid characters is in the label string, or the string is empty, the user is notified of the error and the label is returned to its previous text.
